translation.ja: ああ　俺も“ジョン”って 呼んだ マジで？

translation.en: You liked it.
John was my mother's name.
translation.ja: ジョンは お袋の名だ

translation.en: - Hey. - Hey, gorgeous.
Hey, Marcus.
You okay? You sound down.
I've been better.
Well, I have just the cure.
- What's that? - Me.
Why don't you come over for dinner?
Okay, well....
- Bye. - Yeah, bye. You....
translation.ja: バイ バイ それと･･･

translation.en: You take care...
- ...Sean. - You too. Okay.
translation.ja: ショーン 君も元気で

translation.en: Is Ali here?
translation.ja: アリは？ アリはいない

translation.en: Ali left.
She went with Marcus.
Is that true?
Yeah.
- What? - She left a couple hours ago.
I told you that opportunity wouldn't knock forever.
translation.ja: チャンスは そう度々ない

translation.en: You're right. It doesn't.
translation.ja: ああ　そのとおりだ

translation.en: You.
It's Mark.
Mark.
Do you want to have some lunch?
Yeah. Sure.
You're cooking.
I just wasted my whole goddamn afternoon...
translation.ja: 銀行の貸付係と話して—

translation.en: ...talking with the vice president of loans.
This asshole-- No, wait. He didn't even look me in the eye.
translation.ja: あの男 目も合わせないで—

translation.en: He just sat there, playing with this wooden thingy on his desk.
translation.ja: 机の上の置物を いじくってた

translation.en: - What thingy? What? - The long wooden block thingy.
translation.ja: 木製の板みたいなやつ

translation.en: The nameplate?
Yes. Nameplate.
Yeah, and?
And he's not gonna give me the money.
- Are you sure? - Yes, I'm sure.
translation.ja: 本当に？ 本当よ 私には貸せないって

translation.en: I'm not a good risk.
translation.ja: 本当よ 私には貸せないって

translation.en: And I've got two days before the bank takes the club.
translation.ja: あと２日で店をとられるわ

translation.en: Well, then...
...I would say that the situation is pretty bleak.
translation.ja: 状況は厳しいってことだ

translation.en: And I would say that you are a master of the fucking obvious.
translation.ja: そんなこと 言われるまでもないわ

translation.en: Why did you say that?
What do you mean, Why did I say that? Because it's the truth.
Tess, it's not a judgment, it's the truth.
You don't have any money. The bank won't give you a loan. It's the eleventh hour.
translation.ja: 君は金がなくて 銀行は金を貸さない

translation.en: Hello?
If I were you, I would take Marcus's offer now.
No. And you don't get to say that to me.
translation.ja: イヤよ　あなたに 言われたくないわ

translation.en: I can take the sky is falling from everyone else, but not you.
translation.ja: あなたから その言葉を聞くなんて

translation.en: You know, I need you to be the one that says:
It's only a number, Tess.
We have killed ourselves to keep this place going. How can you just walk away?
translation.ja: 必死で働いてきたのに 今さら逃げる気？

translation.en: I don't care if you walk away, I don't care what happens.
I will beat down the door of every bank in L.A.
translation.ja: 私は街中の銀行を回る

translation.en: I will never give up this club.
translation.ja: 絶対 あきらめないわ

translation.en: Are you sure?
I will never give it up.
There she is.
I thought I'd lost you for a minute at the beginning there.
translation.ja: やっと強気に戻ったな

translation.en: You are such an asshole.
Thank you.
Hope you're hungry. Steaks are on.
translation.ja: お腹は？ 肉を焼いてる

translation.en: What is this?
Right now it's a model.
When it grows up it'll be multi- use space... ...residential, retail.
translation.ja: 住居やショップが入る 多目的ビルだ

translation.en: But this is the Burlesque Lounge.
Best view on the Sunset Strip... ...with no windows.
translation.ja: “窓はないけど サンセットの絶景”

translation.en: When I'm through with it, it'll have a thousand.
translation.ja: それには千の窓がある

translation.en: Does Tess know about this?
- Tess knows I've made an offer to buy. - What makes you think she'd sell?
translation.ja: 店を買うと提案してる 売らないわ

translation.en: I don't think she has a choice. She's going under.
translation.ja: 選択の余地はない いい申し出だよ

translation.en: It's a win- win situation for everyone. It's business, not personal.
translation.ja: この買収は 全員の利益になるんだ

translation.en: I think it's personal for Tess.
And for Coco and Sean and....
What about me?
translation.ja: 私は？ 君なら もっと 高級なクラブで歌えるさ

translation.en: There are other clubs that you can sing and dance in. Better ones.
translation.ja: 君なら もっと 高級なクラブで歌えるさ

translation.en: You don't get it.
I don't understand. I'm trying to do something that benefits everyone.
translation.ja: 全員の利益を考えてるのに なぜ悪者扱いする？

translation.en: - How does that make me the bad guy? - It doesn't, Marcus.
translation.ja: 全員の利益を考えてるのに なぜ悪者扱いする？ 違うの　あなたを 好きになれないだけ

translation.en: It just makes you the wrong guy.
translation.ja: 違うの　あなたを 好きになれないだけ

translation.en: So how'd it go at the bank?
This good.
You want a glass for that?
No, no. I am way beyond a glass.
translation.ja: いいわ　ラッパ飲みする

translation.en: - Tess, I gotta talk to you. - Not right now.
translation.ja: 話があるの 今はダメだ

translation.en: Marcus is gonna tear down the club and build a skyscraper.
translation.ja: マーカスが高層ビルを

translation.en: And how do you know this?
- I saw the model. - I didn't know you were close.
translation.ja: 模型よ ずいぶん親密なのね

translation.en: We're not. I rushed over so I could tell you.
translation.ja: 違うわ　だからここに

translation.en: You're spreading yourself a little bit thin.
Jack, Marcus, whoever.
Tess, I'm trying to help you.
- Let it go. - She's gotta listen.
Okay. Let it go, let it go.
- She needs to listen. - She can't now.
translation.ja: 私 見たの 今はよせ

translation.en: Well, she's gonna hear me. Watch this.
Tess, I gotta talk to you.
- You could knock. This is still my office. - You need to hear what I tell you.
translation.ja: ノックは？ あと２日は 私の部屋よ 話を聞いて

translation.en: I don't. I am tired of talking. I am talked out.
translation.ja: お断りよ　もうウンザリなの

translation.en: - Hear me out. - I don't wanna hear you out.
translation.ja: 大事な話よ やめてったら

translation.en: Do you ever listen to anything other than your own voice?
translation.ja: たまには人の意見を 聞いたらどう？

translation.en: Talk.
Have you ever heard of air rights?
No, I've never heard of air rights. What are air rights?
translation.ja: 知らないわ 空中権って何？

translation.en: Now, that's funny.
Jim, let me call you back, huh?
Please sit down.
A few years ago you wanted to buy my club and I said no.
translation.ja: 数年前 クラブを買いたいと

translation.en: Yeah, and now you changed your mind?
No, but just bear with me for a second...
translation.ja: いいえ　でも話を聞いて

translation.en: ...because I promise this is gonna have a happy ending for both of us.
translation.ja: お互いのためになる話よ

translation.en: How much you planning to sell your condos for?
translation.ja: このマンション いくらで売る気？

translation.en: Well, they start at a million and go up from there, depending on the view.
translation.ja: 眺望がいいほど 部屋の値段が上がるが

translation.en: That's beautiful.
So, what if I told you that a 20- story office building...
translation.ja: もしクラブの跡地に— 20階のビルが 建つとしたら？

translation.en: ...was going up where my club is?
translation.ja: 20階のビルが 建つとしたら？

translation.en: That would block his view.
- Ten stories would block his view. - Yeah. Gone.
The way I see it, your beautiful million- dollar ocean and city views...
translation.ja: ここの売りの— 百万ドルの眺望が 消え失せるわけ

translation.en: ...are just gonna vanish into thin air.
translation.ja: 百万ドルの眺望が 消え失せるわけ

translation.en: - Vanish. - Yeah.
Because tomorrow I am going to sell my club to this developer...
translation.ja: 実は明日 クラブを売るつもりなの

translation.en: ...and his 20 stories are gonna be well underway by the time you start selling.
translation.ja: 買い主は跡地に 高層ビルを建てるわ

translation.en: - Trying to sell. - Yeah. Right.
And so I think that we should talk.
translation.ja: そこで相談があるんだけど

translation.en: I'd listen to her.
We're gonna have to auction off everything.
Anything you want me to keep for you?
No.
I just wanna try and do what's best for both of us.
translation.ja: 私は最善を尽くしたいの

translation.en: You gonna shoot me? Please?
No. I'm gonna buy you out.
In the next 24 hours?
No, in the next 24 seconds.
Where did you get this?
Thin air.
Oh, baby.
Thank you.
Just put it out in the universe.
What would really make me so happy...
translation.ja: 私が本当に うれしいのは—

translation.en: ...is to hear from you...
...a great, big, giant, fat: Thank you, Ali.
translation.ja: 心の底から“ありがとう アリ” って言われること

translation.en: I didn't sleep with Vince, I just said that to hurt you.
translation.ja: ヴィンスと寝たなんてウソ

translation.en: I crossed the line.
You think?
I wanna come home.
Okay, you're home.
Now get your ass upstairs and get ready, you're on in 20 minutes.
translation.ja: 支度しなさい あと20分で出番よ

translation.en: And if you ever pull half of the crap that she pulled...
translation.ja: もし あなたが ニッキのマネをしたら—

translation.en: ...you are gonna be out so quick it's gonna make your head spin.
translation.ja: ここから ほっぽり出してやるから

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
And don't ever call me ma'am again.
translation.ja: 二度と“マダム”って 呼ばないで

translation.en: I'm gonna go get dressed for the show.
Thank you, Ali.
So this is what happens when you get a little money?
translation.ja: これぞ金のなせる業か

translation.en: You stop doing manual labor. I'm back there with broken zippers...
translation.ja: 君は労働を放棄し 僕はジッパーや—

translation.en: ...and ostrich feather fans that won't open or close.
translation.ja: 羽根扇子と格闘してる

translation.en: You have no idea what it's like. No idea.
translation.ja: 僕の大変さが分かるか？

translation.en: I quit. Quit.
- Can I use this? - Don't touch my stuff.
translation.ja: 貸して ちょっと！ 触らないでよ

translation.en: I've been looking for you.
Well, you found me.
I wanna talk to you.
I really have to get ready.
I know I messed up, okay? Bigtime.
When? When you lied to me about your engagement being over...
translation.ja: いつ？ 婚約を解消したって ウソをついた時？

translation.en: ...or when you kicked me out?
translation.ja: 婚約を解消したって ウソをついた時？

translation.en: It really was over. Okay? And she's gone.
translation.ja: ウソじゃない 彼女は出てった

translation.en: I'm here to apologize.
I never should have let you walk out that door.
translation.ja: 君を止めるべきだった

translation.en: Go on.
I want you to come back.
So, what's the proposal, exactly?
Well...
...I still have that full box of cookies.
And an empty day bed.
I want the bedroom.
Half.
So are you in or are you out?
translation.ja: それで戻る？ 戻らない？

translation.en: Oh, Jack. Now, see...
...I'm the kind of girl that, when a friend's in trouble, I help.
translation.ja: 私は困ってる友達を 見捨てたりしないわ

translation.en: That's just who I am.
Shut up.
Okay, then. All right.
I finished a song.
I think it's pretty good.
- Can I hear it? - No.
But you can sing it.
Underneath the city lights
There is a world few know about
Where rules don't apply, no
And you can't keep a good girl down
translation.ja: 強い者だけが 　　勝ち残る世界

translation.en: Baby doll just come to life
Under the spotlight
All the girls wanna fall in line
We say hey
Here come the ladies 'Bout to give a little show
translation.ja: 淑女のショーの始まり

translation.en: Here go the boys They're gonna show a little more
Hit it up, get it up Won't let you rest
Hit it up, get it up This is not a test
Hit it up, get it up Gotta give me your best
So get your ass up Show me how you burlesque
translation.ja: これが本物のバーレスク
